mapper.select: select *from (select * from CKJKPT_KHFZ_YGGLKHCKQSFX where zzbz = #{zzbz} and gwbz= #{gwbz} and yggh= #{yggh} and zjhm = #{zjhm} order by tjyf desc ) where rownum<=10
select * from CKJKPT_KHFZ_YGGLKHCKQSFX where zzbz = #{zzbz} and gwbz= #{gwbz} and yggh= #{yggh} and zjhm = #{zjhm} order by tjyf desc limit 10
select *from (select * from CKJKPT_KHFZ_YGGLKHCKQSFX where zzbz = #{zzbz} and gwbz= #{gwbz} and yggh= #{yggh} and zjhm = #{zjhm} order by tjyf desc ) where rownum<=10
